So many people don't understand the true horrors of what is going on in China. Thanks for speaking about this.

comments_since_last_sample.body: The CCP has cultural dignity?  Haha... no.  No, they don't.
Chinese squid game! Where can i sign up and participate? Well at least if my kidneys ever fail, I know who to try a contact.

korean pop culture are likely to stay popular in china long term as long as censorship in china is very strict…

i should add = thai films in china also have some popularity
I used to think people were exaggerating about Hollywood...
Imagine living in China and having a rare blood group, Gives me the chills.
Ziyang zhi Min is still alive??? Wow i thought he's dead. Lol

I can understand why Squid Game is so popular in China.  That series is on one of the worst series I have seen.  I got through 5 episodes and I just could not continue.  Awful!

China puts NO value on his man life of the life of any other living animal for that matter.  They are brutal and uncaring.
This guy is really cute he can hit

Racist westerners are loud and they must be heard. LOL.
